content: The plugin SDK version doesnâ€™t match the {{productName}} version. Please update to a compatible version.

comment.text: This key displays an error message indicating that a plugin's SDK version is incompatible with the current version of the product. It appears in tooltips and toast notifications within the Settings Plugin Dialog and Plugin Item components, informing the user to update the plugin to a compatible version. Translators should ensure the message clearly conveys the need for a plugin update.
